CustomField.formula: OR( AND((Contract_Master_Terms_Formula__c = 'Existing Intapp MSSA Plus Cloud') , ISPICKVAL(Line_of_Business__c, 'Intapp')), AND((Contract_Master_Terms_Formula__c = 'Existing Intapp MSSA plus Cloud and Annex') , ISPICKVAL(Line_of_Business__c, 'Intapp')) , AND((Contract_Master_Terms_Formula__c = 'Existing Intapp MSSA Plus Cloud') , ISPICKVAL(Line_of_Business__c, 'DealCloud')) )
CustomField.label: Cloud Addendum Condition
